entry.title: 暑假作业
entry.content:
暑假作业

英语

  1. 预习八上课本，unit1~unit6标注重点单词和句子，一周拼读一个单元单词，每天拼读10个单词，录音发给秦老师。（发微信。）
  2. 练习本学期七下周报，听力测试卷及创行测试卷，一周做两张听力测试卷。
  3. 完成一副暑假旅行英语手抄报，买八上英语专项阅读练习，一周至少写两篇。
  4. 写6篇作文。
  5. 抄写七下unit1到unit6单词五英一中。
  6. 抄写unit1到unit6划线重点句各三遍。

语文

  1. .阅读名著《红星闪耀中国》及《红岩》，完成20篇摘抄，每本名著各10篇。
  2. 练字。
  3. 用8K纸完成手抄报。
  4. 抄写8篇作文。（题材为亲情，故乡，成长，青春，传统文化，校园，劳动，社会。）））

They will go to some parks in their city and help make them clean. Then, she will take a trip to Beijing with her sister. They will take a train there. They plan to stay in Beijing for a week. Gina is looking forward to the holiday. She believes she will have a great time.

The clouds are clean and soft, like our white sheep.

He lives in Fujian. His hometown is famous for tea.

About three hundred.

(三)听长对话，选择最佳答案。你将听到三段对话，请根据对话内容，选出每个问题的最佳答案。每段对话读两遍。

请听第一段对话，回答第11至13小题。

Hi, George! I read a report about wild animals in a magazine yesterday.

What does the report say, Maria?

It says many wild animals are in danger.

Is the magazine's name Nature?

Yes, it is. After I read it, I felt very angry. Some people killed elephants for their ivories.

They are too cruel. In my opinion, people must stop killing animals for money.

I agree with you. People should know “No trading, no killing”.

It's not far from Nanjing. It takes about two hours to get there by plane or 6 hours in a car. The best way to get there is taking a train. While you are climbing the mountain, you can enjoy the white clouds and wonderful stones around you. In the early morning, the sky looks very beautiful. It's really a nice place to visit.
